name: iCaThNa
description:
A short little game made in about a week. The evil shapes are after you and they won't stop till they make sure you're dead. How many of them can you take out before your impending DOOM?? The Controls :
  • Right Click to switch between defense and offence (Activate and Deactivate your shield)
  • Left Click to shoot
  • That's about it!! You don't need your Keyboard to play this game so you might as well YEET it out of the window.
Post a screenshot of your highscore in the comments. I would love to see it.
